text: Area Code 620 is an area code for most of southern Kansas. It was made on February 3, 2001. The area code goes from the Colorado border to the east, to the Missouri border. 316 is inside it, and it's only for Wichita. ==Other websites== * Area Code History * 1947 Area Code Assignment Plan * List of exchanges from AreaCodeDownload.com, 620 Area Code 620 Category:Wichita, Kansas
title: Area code 620
